text.content:
A locus can be combined with another locus on the same item, sharing the attunement. Each locus increases the rarity of the item and they cannot bring an item quality beyond the rarity as indicated by your character's proficiency bonus.

Proficiency BonusMaximum Rarity
2Uncommon
3Rare
4Very Rare
5Exceptional
6Peerless

A locus is a powerful magical component that can be attached to an item to imbue it with magical properties.

Item Class Restrictions

Certain loci have restrictions on what they can be attached to, these restrictions will be specified by the locus itself.

Attunement

Characters do not attune to loci themselves, rather they attune to the items that the loci are attached to. If the item is already a magical item that requires attunement, attaching a locus does not require an additional attunement slot. If the item is a mundane item, attaching a locus does make the attached item now require attunement.

Item Rarity

Items with loci attached have their rarity increased. See the @UUID[.zI0VWGKnYZqz6sKd]{Combining Loci} rules for the relevant rarities and restrictions on character level.
